description: Chocolate and Peanut butter mousse is an absolutely delicious and decadent healthy-ish dessert that's vegan and gluten-free. Check out some of our other chocolate recipes.
name: Chocolate & Salted Peanut Butter Mousse
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup unsweetened coconut milk yogurt (here we used So Delicious)
1/4 cup vegan whipped topping (here we used So Delicious Cocowhip), thawed
2 tbsp all natural salted peanut butter

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the unsweetened chocolate in a heat proof bowl (you can do this over a double boiler or in the microwave at 20 second increments, stirring each time)
Whisk in yogurt and maple syrup ( don't worry if little bits of chocolate solidify, it's actually better if that happens!)
Gently fold in whipped topping until well incorporated. Refrigerate while you prepare the peanut butter layer
Whisk together peanut butter, yogurt and maple syrup
Gently fold in whipped topping until well incorporated
Layer chocolate and peanut butter mousse in two glasses or bowls. Garnish with berries (optional)
